Reviews.Content: stayed 7 days initially checked woman desk warm conversation eat spacious clean toilet bonus breakfast fine near main road freeway heard noise comfortable sleep nightmare checked payment night left flight 6 7 morning left arrival airport looked bag discovered left ipod hotel called desk clerk told bothered refused cooperate saying leave desk 2 mins finally friend pick afternoon send mail arrival informed grounds pay night informed information friend grief refusing personal belongings holding payment hotel sharks hideout tip staying check belongings leave stay nights

Reviews.Content: definitely pay hot water 5 minute shower king bed 4 pillows brought pillow suppose nice dennys property little shopping center street

Reviews.Title: “unprofessional staff with a horrible attitude.”
Reviews.Author: lindalou555
Reviews.Content: durring stay clean issues start front desk staff reservation giving confirmation tried look false air conditioning failed staff refused move virtually empty spoke manager yelled claiming line deserved relocated lied staff screamed time check front desk staff manual check computer system unpleasant experience

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME HOTEL.....AWESOME ROOM....WARM AND FRIENDLY STAFF!!”
Reviews.Author: Shivvy097
Reviews.Content: thank staff comfort inn stayed 4 nights worth upgraded bigger 108 clean pool temperature breakfast morning highly recommend hotel thank

Reviews.Title: “Motel style, great price”
Reviews.Author: the-amazing-grace
Reviews.Content: stayed comfort inn 2 nights chose price proximity venue wedding attending hotel motel 70 night value money decent size bed huge comfortable pillows firmer bathroom fine flatscreen tv fridge coffee maker etc simple adequate breakfast included price pool spa actually nice dennys door plus minus didnt bother mentioned internet access annoying free wireless 2 minutes time apart expected youre looking decent value money woodland hills motel fine
